question: You came to know about a piece of equipment that would help you at your workplace. Write a letter to your manager. In your letter– describe the equipment– explain how it might be useful at your workplace– offer help in purchasing it
text: I would like to inform you that I have found  Paper shredder equipment  online which is really required for our department.
I enquired about this paper shredder which is a compact one. It has 2 feet in height. The width and breadth have 3 feet respectively. Besides, this will shred 50 papers spontaneously.
Our department has to manually verify the paper claims which should be kept in file. However, this was not done by our staff.
Furthermore, You know already that our employees tear the papers and throw them recklessly. This would affect our company confidentiality which we have to take care of in the upcoming external audit.
If this has been installed and make sure to clear the papers appropriate time. We would gain reputation from the clients.
Please let me know if you are interested in this, I could probably get a quotation from the vendors and bring this to your attention on this to finalize it.
Looking forward to hearing you positively
